name: Miltank
flavorText:
Its milk is packed
with nutrition,
making it the ultimate beverage
for the sick or
weary.

previous.name: Magby
previous.flavorText:
Each and every
time it inhales
and exhales, hot embers dribble out
of its mouth and
nostrils.

next.name: Blissey
next.flavorText:
Anyone who takes
even one bite of
BLISSEY's egg be­ comes unfailingly
caring and pleas­
ant to everyone.

with nutrition,
making it the ultimate beverage
for the sick or
